name: MEEncodedOutgoingMessage
desc: An object that contains the signed or encrypted representation of a message’s RFC 2822 data.

items.name: init(rawData: Data, isSigned: Bool, isEncrypted: Bool)
items.desc: Creates an object that contains the outgoing message’s encoded data, and indicates if the encoder encrypted or signed the message.

items.name: var isEncrypted: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates if the message encoder encrypted the message.

items.name: var isSigned: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates if the message encoder signed the message.

items.name: var rawData: Data
items.desc: The encrypted, signed, or both encrypted and signed data for the outgoing message.
